projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: A calculator designed to replicate a common calculator, it easily allows for small and handful calculations.

projects.name: ID Identifier
projects.description: A webpage designed for the identification of a legit and proper South African Identity Document(ID), it  can tell the difference between a citizen,refugee or foreign national and also tell if ID owner is male or female.

projects.name: E-Commerce
projects.description: A multi-paged Anime based e-commerce website that allows for the purchase and reading of mangas like Jujutsu Kaisen.

projects.name: Temparature Converter
projects.description: A webpage containing a calculator that assists for the user to convert Celsius-to-Fahrenheit and also Fahrenheit-to-Celsius
